definition: to visit (a large number of places)/to tour around (the whole country, the whole city etc)
to play/to have fun/to trifle with/toy/sth used for amusement/curio or antique (Taiwan pr. [wan4])/to keep sth for entertainment
variant of 玩[wan2]/Taiwan pr. [wan4]
everywhere/all over/classifier for actions: one time
variant of 遍[bian4]

sentences.english: But let's explore all of Oahu first.
sentences.chinese: 但我们先把欧胡岛玩遍了再说。

sentences.english: Have fun while you can. The hard times are just around the corner.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以在北京玩玩，但不可能玩遍这座古城。

sentences.english: We can go sightseeing in Beijing but we can't do justice to the ancient city.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以在北京玩玩，但不可能玩遍这座古城。

definition: to travel around (the world, a country etc)
journey around the world
to go everywhere/to scour (the whole town)
to travel around/to tour/to cross

variant of 周遊|周游, to tour/to travel around
to amuse oneself/to have fun/to go sightseeing/to take a stroll
theme park

to eat, drink and be merry (idiom)/to abandon oneself to a life of pleasure
